availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Purvis (Rowan County, Kentucky, farmer and pvt 40th KY Mtd Inf USA)

body.p: Rowan County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Purvis. Father of America Purvis, Josephine Purvis, Martha Purvis, and Alice Purvis. Farmer in Rowan County in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 29, 1863, to December 30, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rowan County, p. 618.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rowan County, Morehead, p. 117A.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 439.
